main event: A civilian reported sighting one or more round or oblong objects close to trees, traveling very fast and then climbing gradually out of sight.
interesting points: The objects were glowing very bright,The sighting was characterized by features typical of a meteor except for the duration, which could not be determined, The direction of travel was noted as NW-SE, The sighting duration was unspecified, The report is part of Project 10073, which is likely linked to Project Blue Book.
sighted object: one or more round or oblong glowing objects
witness description: mill workers and locals in the area
